DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : CHINA
DOC.TEXT: Government_Issues Union Edict : All foreign-funded firms in the booming coastal regions have orders from Beijing to establish labor_unions by the end of the year to safeguard workers ' rights , a state-run newspaper said . The policy applies to all such firms that began operations before June in the coastal areas , which have the largest concentrations of joint_ventures and other overseas-funded enterprises . In other regions , 60 % of foreign-invested enterprises must begin setting_up trade_unions , the China Daily reported , quoting Yang Xinfu , vice_chairman of the All-China Federation of Trade_Unions .
